Uses of Interface
org.micromanager.display.ChannelDisplaySettings.Builder

  • Packages that use ChannelDisplaySettings.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.micromanager.display
    This package contains classes related to Micro-Manager's display windows, which are used to show image data and metadata to the user.

    • Uses of ChannelDisplaySettings.Builder in org.micromanager.display

      ChannelDisplaySettings.Builder DisplayManager.channelDisplaySettingsBuilder()
